name: Serenity Tee
description:
The Serenity Tee returns with its signature silhouette and year-round neutral shade. Layer it under blazers and pair with jeans or skirts—this cabi cult favorite is your go-to for comfort and calm, ready to complement any outfit from morning meetings to weekend outings.

  • Easy fit, V-neckline, relaxed wedge shape, dropped shoulders with slim long sleeves
  • Rib knit
  • XXS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, V-neckline, relaxed wedge shape, dropped shoulders with slim long sleeves

name: You Complete Me Top
description:
The You Complete Me Top in white is the tee you can’t live without. This seasonless, dressed-up shirt features an easy-to-loose fit and ribbed knit crew neckline. With chic cap sleeves and endless pairing options, it will complete your wardrobe. 

  • White 
  • Easy-to-loose fit, ribbed knit crew neck, cap sleeves 
  • Classic poly 
  • XXS-XXL
fit: Easy-to-loose fit, ribbed knit crew neck, cap sleeves

name: Epitome Top
description:
The Epitome Top in matte satin is peak elegance, with its soft V-neckline flowing into a wide front pleat. Pair it with high-waisted trousers for client dinners or with our Slip Skirt for your next wedding guest look. The drape of the front pleat creates movement that will make you feel on top of the world with every step.

  • Easy fit, banded neckline, V-neckline to a wide pleat at the center front
  • Matte satin
  • XXS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, banded neckline, V-neckline to a wide pleat at the center front

name: Harlow Jean
description:
The Harlow Jean offers a relaxed, mid-rise fit, a slightly tapered leg, and just the right amount of stretch for all-day wear. Finished with a frost wash and classic five-pocket styling, it’s ideal for casual days at work, running errands, or hanging out with friends—leaving just one question: To cuff or not to cuff?

  • Relaxed fit, mid-rise, zip fly, five-pocket styling, slightly tapered leg
  • Inseam: 29 in. | 73.5 cm.
  • Woven
  • 00-20
fit: Relaxed fit, mid-rise, zip fly, five-pocket styling, slightly tapered leg

name: Chance Crop
description:
The Chance Crop is the ultimate year-round pant that pairs with just about everything. With a foldable wide waistband, a cropped wide-leg design, and expert tailoring in a sleek black interlock knit, you’ll take them to travel every chance you get!

  • Easy fit, high rise, cropped wide leg, wide waistband can be folded down, front upper slash pockets, back patch pockets
  • Inseam: 25 in. | 63.5 cm.
  • Interlock knit
  • XXS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, high rise, cropped wide leg, wide waistband can be folded down, front upper slash pockets, back patch pockets

name: Easygoing Jumpsuit
description:
The Easygoing Jumpsuit is your perfect travel companion with wrinkle-resistant fabric that’s a total compliment magnet. Its secret “hatchback” design makes quick changes a breeze, while the elastic waist and slash pockets add comfort and function. From city strolls to long-haul flights, this jumpsuit takes on the day with ease.

  • Easy fit, slash pockets, elastic at the waist, boat neckline, front bodice waist is attached to bottom, open back, dropped shoulder sleeves, cropped length
  • Inseam: 24.5 in. | 62 cm.
  • Interlock knit
  • XXS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, slash pockets, elastic at the waist, boat neckline, front bodice waist is attached to bottom, open back, dropped shoulder sleeves, cropped length

name: Luminous Necklace
description:
The Luminous Necklace features a delicate gold chain with seven radiant stones in burnt orange, olive, black, and gold. Designed to complement the Luminous Earrings, it’s the ideal finishing touch for autumn brunches, office meetings, or evening celebrations—adding effortless sparkle to every look.

  • Delicate chain, seven small round stones in four different colors (burnt orange, olive, black, and gold)
  • Brass chain, lobster clasp, jump ring, round bezel with zinc casting, epoxy and crystal stones, cubic zirconia
  • One Size
    • Length: 18.25 in. | 46.5 cm
fit: Delicate chain, seven small round stones in four different colors (burnt orange, olive, black, and gold)

name: Luminous Earrings
description:
Brighten your look with the Luminous Earrings, crafted in gold with a trio of delicate, shimmering stones. Their graceful cascade adds a radiant touch to business lunches, festive gatherings, or date nights. Pair with the Luminous Necklace for a coordinated glow that stands out anywhere.

  • Small round stone post, two more small round stones on a delicate chain, each earring has different colored stones
  • Brass cable chain and round bezel with zinc casting, cubic zirconia with epoxy, brass bezel post with zinc casting
  • One Size
fit: Small round stone post, two more small round stones on a delicate chain, each earring has different colored stones

name: Felicity Necklace
description:
A gold, medium-weight chain with an emerald-cut green stone and crystal drop, the Felicity Necklace brings instant polish to work presentations and celebratory dinners. Wear its layers together or separately, and pair with the Felicity Earrings for a striking, coordinated finish.

  • Medium-weight chain with emerald-cut, emerald green stone; delicate chain with white round crystal drop and touch of emerald green stones; can be worn together or separately
  • Brass chains, lobster clasp, jump ring, squared bezel with zinc casting, epoxy and crystal stones, cubic zirconia stone
  • One Size
    • Length:
      • S: 16 in. | 41 cm.
      • L: 19.25 in. | 49 cm.
fit: Medium-weight chain with emerald-cut, emerald green stone; delicate chain with white round crystal drop and touch of emerald green stones; can be worn together or separately

name: Felicity Earrings
description:
Gold chain hoops with an emerald-cut emerald green stone drop define the Felicity Earrings. Their medium weight and vibrant color make them ideal for impressing at client meetings and weekend celebrations. Pair with the Felicity Necklace for a coordinated look that shines.

  • Medium-weight chain hoops with emerald-cut, emerald green stone drop
  • Brass C-shaped hoops and squared bezel with zinc casting, epoxy and crystal stones, cubic zirconia stone, titanium post
  • One Size
fit: Brass C-shaped hoops and squared bezel with zinc casting, epoxy and crystal stones, cubic zirconia stone, titanium post

name: Bow-tiful Necklace
description:
Tie your look together with the Bow-tiful Necklace, featuring a delicate gold chain adorned with dainty ball accents and a stunning crystal bow. Perfect for taking timeless touches with you wherever you go, this necklace also matches the Bow-tiful Earrings to complete your ensemble.

  • Delicate chain with balls, small crystal bow
  • Brass chain, lobster clasp, jump ring, brass ribbon-shaped glass stone with zinc casting, cubic zirconia stone
  • One Size
    • Length: 18 in. | 45.5 cm.
fit: Brass chain, lobster clasp, jump ring, brass ribbon-shaped glass stone with zinc casting, cubic zirconia stone

name: Bow-tiful Earrings
description:
Add a touch of sparkle to your day with the Bow-tiful Earrings, featuring a medium crystal bow over two dropped circles—one shiny, one matte. Crafted in gold, they radiate sophistication and are ideal for winter weddings, holiday parties, or special evenings out. Pair with the Bow-tiful Necklace for a standout look.

  • Medium crystal bow on post, two dropped circles (one shiny, one matte)
  • Brass ribbon-shaped bezels with zinc casting, triangle glass stone, titanium post, cubic zirconia stone
  • One Size
fit: Brass ribbon-shaped bezels with zinc casting, triangle glass stone, titanium post, cubic zirconia stone

name: Valentina Necklace
description:
The Valentina Necklace, crafted in gleaming silver, features a clover leaf–inspired medallion on a medium chain. Ideal for holiday parties, office gatherings, or weekend brunches, it adds subtle charm to any look—wear it solo or with the Valentina Earrings for a coordinated, standout finish.

  • Silver
  • Medium chain, clover leaf-inspired drop earring on post
  • Brass chain, lobster clasp, jump ring, pendant with zinc casting, cubic zirconia stone, silver plating
  • One Size
    • Length: 36 in. | 91.5 cm.
fit: Silver

name: Valentina Earrings
description:
Add a touch of charm to your look with the Valentina Earrings, featuring a silver clover-leaf design. These elegant drop earrings pair perfectly with the Valentina Necklace for a polished finish. Whether you're dressing for a special event or elevating your everyday style, they bring just the right amount of sparkle.

  • Clover leaf-inspired drop earring on post
  • Brass pendant with zinc casting and silver plating, titanium post
  • One Size
fit: Clover leaf-inspired drop earring on post

name: Shawl Collar Cardigan
description:
The Shawl Collar Cardigan delivers cozy comfort with its heavyweight yarn, wide ribbing, and handy front patch pockets—it’s like warm hug on a cold day. Throw it over workout gear for a morning coffee date or layer it with a midi dress for chilly evening walks.

  • Easy fit, shawl collar, front patch pockets, long sleeves, wide rib, no closure, straight hem
  • Heavyweight yarn
  • XXS-XL
fit: Easy fit, shawl collar, front patch pockets, long sleeves, wide rib, no closure, straight hem

name: Board Game Pullover
description:
Some patterns demand attention—the Board Game Pullover earns it with its strategic asymmetrical color blocking. Its textured pattern pairs beautifully with tailored joggers at home or dark wash jeans for neighborhood parties. However you style it, wearing a sweater this versatile is always a winning move!

  • Easy fit, crew neckline, slightly dropped shoulders, long sleeves, straight high-low hem with baby side slits, asymmetrical pattern on front, stripes on back
  • Lightweight yarn
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, crew neckline, slightly dropped shoulders, long sleeves, straight high-low hem with baby side slits, asymmetrical pattern on front, stripes on back

name: Easy Turtleneck
description:
The Easy Turtleneck gives you all that cozy turtleneck warmth without feeling tight or bulky. Its lightweight yarn and relaxed fit work great belted with jeans for coffee runs or layered under blazers for chilly office days. Add in its deep black hue and you have a piece that truly makes getting dressed a breeze.

  • Easy fit, relaxed turtleneck shape, medium-sized ribbed sweater knit, long sleeves, straight hem
  • Lightweight yarn
  • XXS-XL
fit: Easy fit, relaxed turtleneck shape, medium-sized ribbed sweater knit, long sleeves, straight hem

name: Blush Turtleneck
description:
The perfect balance of soft and sophisticated, the Blush Turtleneck comes in a heather rose hue that makes everyone look radiant. Its loose neck and relaxed fit make it look equally stunning tucked into high-waisted trousers, under your work blazer, or layered under a cardigan for cozy evenings at home.

  • Relaxed fit, chunky ribbed turtleneck, cable pattern down the center front and back, novelty rib from cable to side seam, slightly dropped shoulders, seed stitch pattern on long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, ribbed hem
  • Medium-weight yarn
  • XS-XL
fit: Relaxed fit, chunky ribbed turtleneck, cable pattern down the center front and back, novelty rib from cable to side seam, slightly dropped shoulders, seed stitch pattern on long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, ribbed hem

name: Boathouse Pullover
description:
The Boathouse Pullover's navy base with blush, khaki, and burnt orange stripes brings nautical charm to your everyday wardrobe. Its soft, textured yarn makes it a joy to wear, while the earthy tones complement everything from white denim to camel trousers.

  • Easy fit, boat neckline, slightly dropped shoulders, long sleeves, multicolor stripe pattern
  • Medium-weight yarn
  • XXS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, boat neckline, slightly dropped shoulders, long sleeves, multicolor stripe pattern

name: Sweater Jacket
description:
A sweater with the finish of a jacket, the Sweater Jacket in deep plum is a textured take on timeless tailoring. Featuring heavyweight yarn and standout novelty crest buttons, it’s made for the woman who wants put-together style with an element of ease.

  • Easy fit, crew neckline with a button front, novelty crest buttons, allover novelty rib stitch, patch pockets, straight hem
  • Heavyweight yarn
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, crew neckline with a button front, novelty crest buttons, allover novelty rib stitch, patch pockets, straight hem

name: Ladylike Cardigan
description:
The Ladylike Cardigan mixes textures beautifully, with its buttoned knit front and flowing chiffon back. This unexpected combo works perfectly over the Artful Cami for brunch with friends or silk blouses for a night out. It's the kind of piece that adds instant polish, keeping you confident and comfortable all at once.

  • Easy fit, crew neckline with a button front, fine-gauge sweater knit at front, chiffon back with ribbed hem
  • Lightweight yarn
  • XS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, crew neckline with a button front, fine-gauge sweater knit at front, chiffon back with ribbed hem

name: Zip-Up Cardigan
description:
The seafoam Zip-Up Cardigan delivers soft warmth with its brushed, fuzzy yarn. The dropped shoulders and ribbed details create a relaxed fit that works perfectly over fitted dresses or with your go-to jeans for casual Friday meetings. Finished with a versatile two-way zipper, transitional weather finally feels manageable.

  • Easy fit, mock zip collar, two-way front zipper, dropped shoulders, ribbed detail at the shoulder
  • Medium-weight yarn
  • XXS-XL
fit: Easy fit, mock zip collar, two-way front zipper, dropped shoulders, ribbed detail at the shoulder

name: Vineyard Pullover
description:
With botanical embroidery cascading down its sleeves, the Vineyard Pullover brings artful detail to your everyday wardrobe. The dropped shoulders and raglan sleeves create a relaxed fit that works on its own for wine tastings or layered over fitted tanks for creative meetings. Pop the cork—it’s a vintage vibe that’s sure to put you in a celebratory mood!

  • Easy fit, wide crew neckline, raglan sleeves, dropped shoulders, embroidery from the neckline and down to the sleeves
  • Heavyweight yarn
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, wide crew neckline, raglan sleeves, dropped shoulders, embroidery from the neckline and down to the sleeves

name: Cocoa Striped Cardigan
description:
The Cocoa Striped Cardigan layers easily over everything with its cozy mix of heather charcoal, ivory, beige, taupe, and dark chocolate. Equal parts cozy and eye-catching, it layers beautifully over denim or tonal basics. Those rich cocoa shades bring the warmth—whether you’re layering up for a weekend stroll or just sipping something sweet at home.

  • Easy fit, wide ribbed neckband, button front, variegated stripe pattern, V-inset on the upper back center, gray ribbed trim throughout
  • Medium-weight yarn
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, wide ribbed neckband, button front, variegated stripe pattern, V-inset on the upper back center, gray ribbed trim throughout

name: Sweater Tee
description:
With shimmery thread trim and an upper patch pocket, this isn’t your average tee. The Sweater Tee offers fine-gauge sweater knit comfort, perfect for running errands in jeans or layering under a blazer for work—a hybrid hero with endless options.

  • Slim fit, crew neckline, slight forward seam raglan sleeves, upper patch pocket, long sleeves, sweater rib at hem and cuffs, contrast shiny trim at neckline, raglan sleeves, side seams, and pocket, straight hem with baby side slits
  • Lightweight yarn
  • XS-XXL
fit: Slim fit, crew neckline, slight forward seam raglan sleeves, upper patch pocket, long sleeves, sweater rib at hem and cuffs, contrast shiny trim at neckline, raglan sleeves, side seams, and pocket, straight hem with baby side slits

name: Henley Pullover
description:
The Henley Pullover delivers a classic thermal look with a delicate pointelle twist. Its lightweight knit and flattering fit layer easily under jackets or over tees. In vintage white with a four-button front, it’s your perfect sweater for everyday wear, from breakfast with friends to cozy nights in.

  • Slim fit, crew neckline, button-front Henley placket, novelty pointelle stitch, sweater rib around neckline, placket, cuffs, and hem, long sleeves, straight hem
  • Lightweight yarn
  • XS-XL
fit: Slim fit, crew neckline, button-front Henley placket, novelty pointelle stitch, sweater rib around neckline, placket, cuffs, and hem, long sleeves, straight hem

name: Camden Coat
description:
With the look of wool, minus the itch, the Camden Coat is a copper stunner with a cozy, brushed texture. Its slightly A-line shape, oversized notch collar, and tons of tailored touches make this a true classic with an autumn twist.

  • Easy fit, oversized notch collar, double-breasted, waist seam, large patch pockets, long sleeves with functioning buttons, slight A-line shape, back waist tab with buttons, inverted pleats out of the back waist seam, back vent
  • Woven
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, oversized notch collar, double-breasted, waist seam, large patch pockets, long sleeves with functioning buttons, slight A-line shape, back waist tab with buttons, inverted pleats out of the back waist seam, back vent

name: Plush Jacket
description:
The Plush Jacket's softly structured silhouette and seaming create a flattering, close-to-body fit that elevates any look. Layer it over a silk blouse for a gallery opening or a lightweight knit for weekend brunch—that cloud-like texture adds instant sophistication wherever your day takes you.

  • Slim fit, tapered band collar, button front, seaming from shoulder to hem, upper flap pockets, lower inseam welt pockets, long sleeves, buttoned cuffs
  • Stretch woven
  • XS-XXL
fit: Slim fit, tapered band collar, button front, seaming from shoulder to hem, upper flap pockets, lower inseam welt pockets, long sleeves, buttoned cuffs

description:
Rugged charm meets runway-ready style with our Barn Jacket. Featuring a relaxed fit, button front, and oversized patch pockets, it’s crafted from the same cotton-Tencel fabric as the beloved Beau Jean. With a classic chore coat vibe, it’ll add versatility to your wardrobe—and luckily it comes without the chores.

  • Relaxed fit, button front, upper patch pockets, oversized lower patch pockets, long sleeves, buttoned cuffs
  • Woven
  • XS-XL
fit: Relaxed fit, button front, upper patch pockets, oversized lower patch pockets, long sleeves, buttoned cuffs

name: Leopard Coat
description:
Plush, polished, and on-trend, the Leopard Coat is your cold-weather showstopper. With unbelievably soft faux fur and bold, oversized details—like its buttons, pockets, and personality—this piece ensures you'll be turning heads and spotted everywhere you go.

  • Easy fit, oversized notch collar, large novelty buttons, lower patch pockets, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs, fully lined
  • Faux fur
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, oversized notch collar, large novelty buttons, lower patch pockets, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs, fully lined

name: Jaden Jacket
description:
The Jaden Jacket is where elegance meets cool. Think of it as a velvet jean jacket—you can wear it with just about anything. With its tailored fit, functional sleeve buttons, and a printed lining, the Jaden just works—whether you pair it with jewels or jeans.

  • Slim fit, notch collar, single self-covered button closure, upper welt pocket, lower welt pockets with flaps, functional sleeve buttons, back vent, tunic length
  • Woven velvet
  • XS-XL
fit: Slim fit, notch collar, single self-covered button closure, upper welt pocket, lower welt pockets with flaps, functional sleeve buttons, back vent, tunic length

name: Blake Bomber
description:
The Blake Bomber creates a best-in-class look by blending French terry with sporty nylon details. It’s a nod to the classic flight jacket, including zip-front convenience and a zipper pocket for added style. Pair it with the Blake Trouser or Navigator Pant for a mixed media style that soars.

  • French terry and woven
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, zip-front hoodie with a metal-tipped drawcord, front welt pockets with snaps, long sleeves with contrast nylon underneath, sweater-ribbed cuffs at the sleeves, hem, and body, inside placket, upper left sleeve pocket with a zipper

name: Chill Jacket
description:
Made from a suede-knit fabric, the Chill Jacket features a photorealistic tweed print with black trim and side back tabs. Even cooler? It offers two distinct looks—wear it buttoned up for a polished look or open for a more casual, chic vibe.

  • XS-XL
fit: Relaxed fit, tall funnel collar, double-breasted, lower front welt pockets, side seam back tabs with buttons, long sleeves, black trim along collar, front welts, and hem

name: Shrunken Moto Jacket
description:
The Shrunken Moto Jacket brings a modern edge to your wardrobe with its slim-fitting silhouette and stealthy stretch. Corduroy details and matte black zips add a touch of texture that works equally well over fitted dresses for date nights or with tailored trousers for a workday statement.

name: London Cord
description:
The London Cord is elevating corduroy, with a premium wash usually seen in designer collections. Wide-legged and crafted with rich high-low texture along with golden antique hardware, these pants offer a luxurious feel. Whether you’re traveling through Heathrow or Houston, these pants deliver first-class comfort and style.

  • Easy fit, high rise, wide leg, five-pocket styling, golden antique hardware
  • Inseam:
    • R: 31 in. | 78.5 cm.
    • L: 34 in. | 86.5 cm.
  • Corduroy
  • 0-16
fit: Easy fit, high rise, wide leg, five-pocket styling, golden antique hardware

name: Chill Trouser
description:
Bootcuts are back and the Chill Trouser is ready to make a statement. With a flattering flare, slim-fit silhouette, and a tweed print inspired by the Chill Jacket, these pants bring chic and chill together. With a high rise, wide waistband, and patch pockets, these pants are easy to wear and bound to make you feel effortlessly cool.

  • Slim fit, high rise, flared leg, wide waistband, patch pockets in front and back
  • Inseam:
    • R: 31 in. | 78.5 cm.
    • L: 34 in. | 86.5 cm.

name: Navigator Pant
description:
Fall’s favorite olive hue is denim’s cooler cousin in the Navigator Pant. Blending high-rise comfort with straight-leg style, it’s the casual, go-with-everything pant your wardrobe needs. Designed with large, angled pockets and cuff-worthy wide hems, your fashion compass will be pointing to cool, laid-back looks.

  • Easy fit, high rise, straight leg, large angled front patch pockets, back patch pockets, inner knee dart, wide hem
  • Inseam: 30 in. | 76 cm.
  • Woven
  • 0-16
fit: Easy fit, high rise, straight leg, large angled front patch pockets, back patch pockets, inner knee dart, wide hem

name: Milly Pant
description:
The Milly Pant features a subtle tonal zebra print that adds just the right amount of style without being over the top. With a slim fit, high-rise waist, straight leg design, and patch pockets, this versatile pant is easy to wear like a solid—walk on the wild side any day you like.

  • Inseam: 30 in. | 76 cm.
  • Woven
  • 0-16
fit: Inseam: 30 in. | 76 cm.

name: Blake Trouser
description:
The Blake Trouser is your modern go-to for work, the weekend, and everything in between. Combining the tailored look of a trouser with the next-level comfort of French terry, it features a high rise, relaxed fit with a wide leg, and single pleat. Need some extra length? Its extra-wide hem can be let out for added inches!

fit: Relaxed fit, high rise, wide leg, single pleat, slash pockets in front, welt pockets in back, partial elastic at the center back waist, wide hem

name: Relaxed Jogger
description:
With the same cozy fabric as our Fall ’24 Book Club Pant, the Relaxed Jogger features a soft brushed knit, easy fit, and high-rise elastic waist. Stylish yet practical with front slash and back welt pockets, pair these pants with the Relax Tee for a stress-free travel set.

fit: Easy fit, high rise, elastic waist, front slash pockets, back welt pockets, tapered leg cuffs

name: Snap Crop
description:
With soft brushed knit, wide cropped legs, and functional side snaps, the Snap Crop is designed for a relaxed vibe. Made from the same fabric as the Fall ’24 Unwind Pant, it’s perfect for casual outings, weekend errands, or cozy evenings at home. Pair it with the matching Snap Top or Board Game Pullover for a coordinated look that’s both put-together and easygoing.

name: Beau Jean
description:
The Beau Jean is crafted from a soft cotton-Tencel blend for a high rise, easy fit, and wide leg. Two belt loop sizes keep the removable self-tie belt secure, adding a customizable touch. Wear them for brunch, weekend errands, or relaxed outings—you might have other boyfriend jeans, but none quite like these.

  • Inseam:

    • L: 35 in. | 89 cm.
  • Woven
  • 0-16

name: Soho Jean
description:
Our Soho Jean is back in a new wash, offering the same high rise, slim-fit straight leg you love. With just the right amount of stretch and a signature center back seam, it keeps you feeling fashionable all day. The cropped length pairs easily with almost any shoe, making it ideal for office days, after-work drinks, or weekends away looking for fall foliage—the kind of versatility you can count on.

fit: Slim fit, high rise, straight leg, cropped length, center back seam on each leg, five-pocket styling, golden antique hardware

description:
Shaped with a barrel-tapered leg and finished in an “oil-stained” wash, the Cooper Jean is a relaxed high-rise pant with a refined edge. An on-trend take on classic denim that’ll make your current wardrobe feel refreshed, its cropped fit and rugged details make it ideal for weekend getaways or casual nights out with friends.

The Tuxedo Kick Flare mixes classic and cool with a sleek ink wash, wide wale corduroy accents, and cropped flared legs—the same silhouette as the Spring ’25 Kick Back Kick Flare. Its blend of polished and playful details makes it ideal for dinner dates, concerts, or nights out. Pair it with the Shrunken Moto Jacket when you’re feeling both classy and a little sassy.

  • Slim fit, mid-rise, wide wale corduroy down the side seam, waist, and behind front pockets, cropped flare legs, five-pocket styling, matte black hardware

name: Venice Jean
description:
The Venice Jean is a sun-bleached beauty with the same silhouette as the dark wash Fall '24 Venice Trouser Jean with an on-trend light wash. Its leg-lengthening style is a standout choice for fall, perfect for brunch, gallery visits, or city strolls.

  • Slim fit, high rise, wide leg, front welt hip pockets with topstitching, back patch pockets
  • Inseam:
    • R: 32 in. | 81 cm.

name: Chloe Blouse
description:
Soft ivory matte satin gives the Chloe Blouse a luxurious feel, complemented by cascading ruffles and a metallic-tipped tie for boho charm. Its relaxed fit works perfectly tucked into high-waisted denim for a day at the winery or flowing over slim pants for a cozy winter dinner. Either way, its gathered detailing creates beautiful movement with every step.

  • Relaxed fit, gathered ruffle at the neckline with a metal-tipped tie, pullover style, raglan long sleeves, slightly full sleeves with small elastic at cuffs, gathered ruffle across armholes, three rows of gathered ruffles down each sleeve
  • Matte satin
  • XXS-XL
fit: Relaxed fit, gathered ruffle at the neckline with a metal-tipped tie, pullover style, raglan long sleeves, slightly full sleeves with small elastic at cuffs, gathered ruffle across armholes, three rows of gathered ruffles down each sleeve

name: Silhouette Blouse
description:
The Silhouette Blouse brings vintage boho charm with its pintuck pleats and flounced peplum hem—perfect when front-tucked into high-waisted jeans or worn loose over leggings. Its sheer fabric layers beautifully under cardigans for cool mornings or stands alone with camisoles, while its silhouette adds just enough drama without overwhelming your frame.

  • Easy fit, band collar, button front, doubled forward shoulder yoke, front pintucks front yoke to flounce at hem, doubled back yoke, long sleeves, wide cuffs with fabric-covered button closures
  • Poly chiffon
  • XS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, band collar, button front, doubled forward shoulder yoke, front pintucks front yoke to flounce at hem, doubled back yoke, long sleeves, wide cuffs with fabric-covered button closures

name: Brit Blouse
description:
The Brit Blouse adds unexpected charm to your workweek rotation with its floral print and ruffled shoulder details. It’s a modern twist on floral that feels fresh, not fussy. And as the Heart of cabi item, a portion of the net proceeds supports 60+ local disaster relief events and Love Local events.

  • Easy fit, boat neckline, pullover style, ruffle at shoulder seams, back waist with peplum shirring
  • Matte satin
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, boat neckline, pullover style, ruffle at shoulder seams, back waist with peplum shirring

name: Mesh Shirt
description:
The Mesh Shirt's mosaic tile print in blush, olive, and dark chocolate adds instant interest under blazers for client calls or worn solo with wide-leg trousers for a night at the theater. Its lightweight fabric layers beautifully without adding bulk, so you can let your style stand out and still feel like yourself.

  • Easy fit, shirt collar, button front, back yoke with tuck, long sleeves, button cuffs, straight hem
  • Mesh
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, shirt collar, button front, back yoke with tuck, long sleeves, button cuffs, straight hem

name: Margot Blouse
description:
With its lustrous finish and subtle baby blue Oxford stripes, the Margot Blouse in stretch satin brings some effortless elevation to your wardrobe. Details like a removable tie and magic cuffs will have you feeling your best, whether tucked into pencil skirts for important meetings or worn loose with white jeans for lunch.

  • Easy fit, button front, removable tie, tuck at back yoke, slight shirttail hem, long sleeves with magic cuffs
  • Satin
  • XS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, button front, removable tie, tuck at back yoke, slight shirttail hem, long sleeves with magic cuffs

name: Dolce Blouse
description:
The Dolce Blouse delivers sweet sophistication, made of gossamer and highlighted with black lace scalloped edges. Thoughtful details like fabric-covered buttons and a flattering high-low hem work perfectly with tailored trousers for celebratory dinners or distressed denim for a more casual look.

  • Easy fit, collar and stand, button front, back yoke with tuck, black lace with scallop details down the center front sides, slight high-low shirttail hem with side seam slits, long sleeves with button cuffs, fabric-covered black buttons
  • Gossamer and lace
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, collar and stand, button front, back yoke with tuck, black lace with scallop details down the center front sides, slight high-low shirttail hem with side seam slits, long sleeves with button cuffs, fabric-covered black buttons

name: Boho Blouse
description:
The Boho Blouse's photorealistic floral print brings romantic charm to your everyday wardrobe with cascading ruffles and a delicate ruffled collar. Those slightly full sleeves create beautiful movements that works tucked into high-waisted trousers for lunch dates or flowing over dark jeans for evenings out. You’ll exude feminine elegance with just enough boho spirit.

  • Easy fit, small ruffled collar, cascading ruffle down the center front, self-covered button front with loops, inside placket behind buttons, slightly full sleeves with small elastic at cuffs, straight hem
  • Poly chiffon
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, small ruffled collar, cascading ruffle down the center front, self-covered button front with loops, inside placket behind buttons, slightly full sleeves with small elastic at cuffs, straight hem

name: Ethereal Blouse
description:
The Ethereal Blouse combines delicate with edgy thanks to its subtle snake print and ruffled details. Its floaty fabric works perfectly tucked into dark wash jeans on the weekends or layered under blazers for office days. You'll find yourself reaching for it whenever you want something feminine with a little bite.

  • Easy fit, band collar, Henley placket with ruffles on both sides, short sleeves with elastic shirring and a ruffle at the hem, straight hem
  • Shadow stripe poly chiffon
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, band collar, Henley placket with ruffles on both sides, short sleeves with elastic shirring and a ruffle at the hem, straight hem

name: Sprinkle Top
description:
The Sprinkle Top adds a little retro charm to your closet, with its black and brown polka dot print, bias-trim detail, and relaxed V-neck silhouette. It’ll add a dash of whimsy to everything you wear—try it tucked into wide-leg trousers for a coffee date or layered under a jacket when you head to book club.

  • Easy fit, V-neckline to a button front, bias trim-framing neckline, forward yoke detail, shirttail hem

  • XS-XXL
fit: Easy fit, V-neckline to a button front, bias trim-framing neckline, forward yoke detail, shirttail hem

name: Complete Top
description:
The Complete Top is full of sophisticated style, with its pleated shoulders, ribbed knit neckline, and delicate merrow edge detailing. Tuck it into tailored trousers for important presentations or pair it with the London Cord for a sleek monochromatic look. It's the kind of top that’s a total joy to wear.

  • Relaxed fit, intentionally dropped armholes, ribbed knit crew neckline, pleated shoulder details, merrow edge at hem and armholes
  • Classic poly
  • XXS-XL
fit: Relaxed fit, intentionally dropped armholes, ribbed knit crew neckline, pleated shoulder details, merrow edge at hem and armholes

name: Artful Cami
description:
The Artful Cami in rich dark chocolate is full of indulgent texture with its matte satin finish, scalloped hem, and intricate embroidery. Layer it under blazers for polished work looks or wear solo with wide-leg trousers for dinner parties. It’s sweet enough to make you stand a little taller.

  • Easy fit, V-neckline with embroidery on the front and back, scalloped hem with eyelet detailing and embroidery, adjustable straps
  • Matte satin
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, V-neckline with embroidery on the front and back, scalloped hem with eyelet detailing and embroidery, adjustable straps

name: Paige Top
description:
The Paige Top's bold python print in rich purple brings instant drama to your everyday wardrobe. Its easy silhouette with a Henley placket and subtle high-low hem works perfectly with dark wash jeans for weekend errands or paired with the Jaden Jacket for cool-toned contrast. You'll feel bold and confident every time you slip it on.

  • Easy fit, collar and stand, Henley placket, front yoke with shirring, back yoke with tuck, slight high-low hem

  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, collar and stand, Henley placket, front yoke with shirring, back yoke with tuck, slight high-low hem

name: Striped Top
description:
The Striped Top brings Oxford polish with a satin twist. It features plum stripes that catch the light and an unexpected double collar that feels both classic and fresh. The stretchy fabric moves with you, playing beautifully with both brown leather and sleek black pieces when you want effortless sophistication without trying too hard.

  • Easy fit, collar and stand, button front with covered placket, stripes in contrasting direction on placket, unique “double” collar with top layer sewn down, straight hem
  • Satin
  • XS-XL
fit: Easy fit, collar and stand, button front with covered placket, stripes in contrasting direction on placket, unique “double” collar with top layer sewn down, straight hem

description:
If you want a look that’s as comfortable as it is distinctive, reach for the Eden Cowl Neck Top. Its lofty, lightweight fabric, side seam zippers, and oversized silhouette pair perfectly with cords, jeans, or joggers—ideal for laid-back weekends or running around town in plush and polished style.

  • Soft knit
  • XS-XL
fit: Relaxed fit, cowl neckline with an oversized notch in back, dropped shoulders, front horizontal seam detail, long sleeves with wide cuffs, wide band at hem, side seam zippers

name: Colette Tee
description:
The Colette Tee’s super soft rib knit and striking scoop neckline bring a touch of sophistication to every look. Its curve-detail hem adds a playful twist—layer it with the Simone Scarf for a look that’s as easy as it is chic, perfect for all the style and none of the fuss.

  • Rib knit
  • XXS-XL
fit: Easy fit, scoop neckline in a contrast black rib, contrast black rib along the hem and side seams with a curve detail, three functional side seam snaps, long sleeves

name: Bailey Top
description:
The Bailey Top delivers stylish practicality in a soft brushed knit as your wardrobe’s new most reliable player. Its relaxed fit and flattering V-neckline gets structure from that banded collar, while the new-neutral hue pops against denim or our Unwind Pant, transitioning seamlessly from conference calls to weekend coffee dates and everything in between.

  • XS-XL
fit: Relaxed fit, band with collar, V-neckline, pullover style, slightly dropped shoulders, long sleeves, straight hem with baby side seam slits

name: Crewneck Tee
description:
The Crewneck Tee, made from a soft, 100% cotton slub knit, is your perfect all-day companion. Layer it under a blazer for the office, pair with jeans for weekend errands, or tuck into a skirt for lunch with friends—its slim fit and classic cut work everywhere you go.

  • Slub knit
  • XS-XL
fit: Slim fit, crew neckline, cap sleeves, straight hem

name: Charlie Tee
description:
Feminine edge meets graphic tee comfort in the Charlie Tee, where a faux lace screen print adds real style. Its cap sleeves and straight hem create a chic-meets-casual vibe that works with everything from the Slip Skirt and sneakers to tailored trousers. It's your go-to when you want to look effortless with just the right amount of edge.

  • Easy fit, crew neckline, screen print on front, cap sleeves, cover stitch details on seams and back center seam, straight hem

Crafted in our signature cabi cashmere, the Relaxed Tee offers an easy fit, V-neckline, and long sleeves for all-day comfort. Layer it with your favorite lounge pants or pack it for travel—this richly-hued companion is ready for cozy mornings and long flights, and it matches perfectly with your favorite cool-weather colors.

  • Soft brushed knit
  • XS-XL

name: V-Neck Tee
description:
With cap sleeves, a slim fit, and straight hem, the V-neck Tee is your essential layering piece. Made from 100% cotton for all-day comfort, it’s perfect under cardigans, blazers, or jackets—a great base for any look, whether you’re headed to work or meeting friends for lunch.

  • Slim fit, V-neckline, cap sleeves, straight hem
  • Slub knit
  • XS-XL

description:
The Snap Top is crafted from a brushed knit fabric for a slim yet comfy fit, with decorative shoulder snaps and side slits. Made from the same fabrication as the Fall '24 Unwind Pant, it’s ready to complete any outfit in a snap—pair it with the Snap Crop for a particularly pulled-together look.

  • XS-XXL

name: Cap Sleeve Henley
description:
Stripes and softness come together in perfect harmony with the Cap Sleeve Henley. Made from our favorite Serenity Tee baby rib knit, it boasts cap sleeves and a wide crew neckline for just the right amount of coverage. And when you pair it with the Navigator Pant? A match made in heaven!

name: Striped Charm Tank
description:
The Striped Charm Tank brings together classic navy and olive stripes in the fitted, bra-friendly silhouette you loved last spring. Wear it on its own or layer it under the Blake Bomber—either way, it’s a low-effort, high-charm addition to your everyday wardrobe.

name: Slip Skirt
description:
The midi-length Slip Skirt in black satin features a foldable wide knit waistband and a side-front high slit, making it easy to slip into a wide range of styles. Comfortable enough for casual errands thanks to a shorter built-in skirt for support, it’s also elevated enough for black-tie events. Don’t know where to start? It pairs perfectly with the Epitome Top for a touch of effortless elegance.

name: Tulip Skirt
description:
The Tulip Skirt combines a high rise, slim fit design with a wide flounce hem for an ultra-flattering silhouette. Crafted from woven plum-colored fabric, it features front slash pockets and two functional back snaps. Ideal for work events and girls’ nights out, it’s sure to be a favorite fall pick.

name: Gigi Skort
description:
Dark chocolate brown meets downtown cool in the Gigi Skort—a short skirt with a hidden agenda. Crafted from faux leather for upscale texture and lined with interlock shorts for comfort, this A-line skort features sleek slash pockets and high-rise tailoring. Wear it for brunch with friends, a night out in the city, or layer with patterned tights for an on-trend, everyday look.

description:
Made of cabi cashmere, the heavenly Haven Dress features a convertible snap cowl neck and a relaxed elastic waist. Whether for lunch or casual outings, it’s designed for comfort and versatility, making it a winter staple you’ll reach for again and again.

  • Easy fit, snap cowl neckline to Henley, drop elastic waist, slash pockets on skirt, long sleeves

name: Bandit Belt
description:
The Bandit Belt unleashes a touch of wild into your wardrobe, with an animal-hide print on authentic leather, a round brass and wood buckle, and natural color variations. Bold yet refined, it’s perfect for adding a daring touch to casual outfits, workwear, or looks for a night out—elevating your style with every wear.

name: Simone Scarf
description:
The Simone Scarf offers statement style with a skin print on pink floral, outlined in black. Made from two layers of silk twill, this better-than-ever scarf adds a pop of polish to gallery visits, after-work cocktails, or travel days—effortlessly elevating your look.

  • Two layers

name: V-Neck Cami
description:
The V-Neck Cami is your layering superhero—fitted, stylish, and versatile. With adjustable straps and a flattering V-neck, it’s available in black, cafe au lait, cinnamon, classic navy, coffee bean, sand, and true white. The perfect staple for any closet, this cami is ready to add even more options to your wardrobe favorites.

  • Black, Cafe Au Lait, Cinnamon, Classic Navy, Coffee Bean, Sand, True White

name: Ballpark Pullover
description:
Step up your style game with the Ballpark Pullover. Crafted with a soft, cashmere-like yarn, this elevated sweatshirt features a relaxed fit and wide crew neckline. The high-low hem is perfect for layering, while raglan sleeves add a unique touch. No doubt about it, this luxe look is a real home run!

name: Hudson Hoodie
description:
Introducing the Hudson Hoodie—the “denim jacket” of hoodies. Its novelty horizontal pique stitch and flat knit stitch hood add flair, while the olive color serves as your new favorite neutral. Blending style with comfort is easy with its zipper front, dropped shoulders, and kangaroo pockets.

name: At Ease Topper
description:
The softest fabric is back in your new favorite wardrobe staple—the At Ease Topper. Crafted from the ultra-soft ponte knit fabric seen in our Spring 2024 Collection, this classic navy jacket boasts a wide-notch collar and inset welt pockets. Slip it on and feel instantly at ease.

name: Cheeky Pant
description:
We’re not being coy; the Cheeky Pant in classic navy is a must-have. Crafted from ponte knit, these high-rise, slim-fit pants boast a pull-on elastic waist and handy patch pockets. The cropped kick flare leg easily dresses up or down.

description:
Meet the Amelia Pant. Its sleek, slim fit features a subtle camo print that doubles as a versatile neutral. Crafted with practical patch and cargo pockets, it’s perfect for those who value both style and utility in their daily wardrobe.

name: Charm Tank
description:
The Charm Tank offers the same fitted silhouette you loved last spring, made with the soft jersey knit fabric from our V-Neck Camis. Bra-friendly with a scoop neckline, it’s the perfect foundation for layering. Your closet’s most charming plus-one is back!

name: Charm Tank

The same silhouette as your Spring ’25 favorite, this Charm Tank comes in a black jersey knit featuring a scoop neckline and non-adjustable straps. It’s also bra-friendly, so you can confidently wear it solo or pair it under the sheer Silhouette Blouse.
